definitions.definition: The final battle between two nemeses , in which there can be but one victor .
The final round in a poker match, where the all remaining players' cards have to be put down on the table and shown.

main_definition: The final battle between two nemeses , in which there can be but one victor .
secondary_definitions: ( poker ) The final round in a poker match, where the all remaining players' cards have to be put down on the table and shown.
